markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 5"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Skillful Climber](/Feats.aspx?ID=4009) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Vanara" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=368" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Impossible Lands](/Sources.aspx?ID=146) pg. 56

</column>

---

You can scamper up or down surfaces as nimbly as a monkey. You gain a climb Speed of 10 feet. If you have the [Climber's Tail](/Feats.aspx?ID=4001) ancestry feat, your total climb Speed increases to your land Speed when climbing trees.
name: Skillful Climber

You gain a climb Speed of 10 feet. If you have the Climber's Tail ancestry feat, your total climb Speed increases to your land Speed when climbing trees.
